articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Algeria
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Algeria
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Abdel Malik Sellal upon his re-appointment as prime minister of Algeria.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the prime minister greater successes in his work for stability and development of the country.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Ramtane Lamamra upon his re-appointment as foreign minister of Algeria on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Slovak Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Slovak Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Milan Lajciak, Slovak ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Abusing Humanitarian Issue for Their Sinister Political Purpose
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Abusing Humanitarian Issue for Their Sinister Political Purpose
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye in a "congratulatory speech" on May 19 urged the DPRK to "resume the reunion of divided families", talking about "pain of divided family members at advanced ages" and "government-level efforts". Earlier, she brought together riff-raffs of delegations of "people of provinces in the north" at which she talked rubbish that the above-said reunion has not taken place due to the north, claiming that "the north is refusing even the proposal for dialogue" though the divided families are suffering bitter pain.
					 The south Korean puppet forces are letting the "10 million divided families committee" and other human scum organizations and conservative media mislead public opinion at home and abroad, asserting that the north is to blame for the failure to hold the reunion of divided families and their relatives. 
					
					 They are claiming that they would try to do something to substantially settle the issue of reunion but have blocked the way of all contacts and visits between the north and the south. Yet, they are calling for "responsible steps" on the part of someone in a bid to stir up the atmosphere of confrontation. 
					
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society in a statement on Wednesday termed it shameless sophism of those who derailed the reunion of divided families and an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean belligerent forces are talking about "pain of divided families" and "their sufferings" while staging the north-targeted nuclear war drills strongly denounced and rejected at home and abroad. This is the height of hypocrisy and brazen-faced red herring, the statement said, and noted:
					
					 A flurry of rhetoric let loose by the Park Geun Hye group is nothing but a cynic ploy to paint itself as "humanitarians" in a bid to evade the blame for having driven the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe and mislead public opinion at home and abroad and thus tide over the serious crisis of the regime.
					
					 The Park group is behaving so disgustingly as to vociferate about Natural Law and "pain" while incriminating the meeting of fellow countrymen. It is little short of rubbing salt into the wounds of the divided families and their relatives once again.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet group evade the blame for having derailed the above-said reunion.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam headed by Le Huu Nghia, vice-chairman of the Central Theory Council of the party, arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Arranges Friendship Meeting
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Arranges Friendship Meeting
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, arranged a friendship meeting at his embassy on Thursday on the occasion of the 120th anniversary of demise of the national hero of the Cuban people Jose Marti and the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Present there on invitation were teachers and students of Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies.
					
					 The participants watched a film showing the life and activities of Jose Marti who dedicated his all to the freedom and liberation of the Cuban people before talking to one another about the need to boost cooperation between the two countries.

articles.title: International Peace Symposium Takes Place
articles.content:
International Peace Symposium Takes Place
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- An International Peace Symposium took place here on Thursday by women of different countries.
					 Present there were Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People (KCSWP) and vice-chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, officials concerned and members of a delegation to take part in the 2015 international women's grand march for the reunification and peace in Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made by anti-war peace activists Irish Maguire Mairead, Liberian Gbowee Leymah Roberta, American Benjamin Susan Jill, Colombian Guerrero Acevedo Angela Patricia, Japanese Takazato Suzuyo and Kim Chun Sil, member of the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims,
					
					 Speakers said that the Japanese imperialists keen on aggression and war committed the heinous crimes of forcing 200,000 Korean women into sexual slavery, slashing the Asia-Pacific region and slaughtering its people.
					
					 They said the U.S. is trying to ignite wars in different parts of the world, branding it as a kingdom of terrorism and a kingpin of human right abuses.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Women's organizations and organizations for peace movement have made efforts for women's rights in various parts of the world.
					
					 The power of the women is inexhaustible as they love justice and peace and aspire after the bright future of children. But their human rights are being mercilessly trampled down in the capitalist countries.
					
					 Speakers extended full support and firm solidarity to the struggle of the Korean people for the reunification and peace of the country, saying that the tragedy of the Korean nation who has lived divided into two for a long period should be ended as early as possible.

articles.title: Meeting with Korean Women Held
articles.content:
Meeting with Korean Women Held
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held between the Korean women and members of a delegation to take part in the 2015 international women's grand march for the reunification and peace in Korea at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 Present there were Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People and vice-chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, women in the fields of science, education, culture, health public and media and members of the delegation.
					
					 Speakers said that the U.S. imperialists had plunged the Korean nation into the holocaust during the Fatherland Liberation War, adding that it was the most barbarous crimes against humanity unprecedented in the history of world wars.
					
					 They denounced the U.S. for bringing nuclear weapons into south Korea and waging frantic war exercises every year by instigating the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The Law on Sex Equality was promulgated, letting the Korean women enjoy the equal rights as men, take part in the life of politics, economy and culture and push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot.
					
					 A ceremony of linking rainbow-stripped cloths took place reflecting the desire of the Koreans and the world women for reunification and peace of the country.

articles.title: Joint Meeting Held at Russian Language Center
articles.content:
Joint Meeting Held at Russian Language Center
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting was held at the Russian Language Center of Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies on Thursday on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
					 Present there were Pak Jong Jin, rector of the university, officials concerned, teachers and students of the university, Minister-councilor Alexandr Minaev and staff members of the Russian embassy here and teachers and students of the embassy school.
					
					 Speakers said that the heroic Soviet army and people beat back aggressors and won the victory in the Soviet Union-Germany war by displaying boundless love for the country, devotion, indomitable will and popular heroism.
					
					 The participants enjoyed the wartime songs of the two countries sung by students of Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies and the embassy school and looked back with deep emotions upon the great services rendered by the former generations who dedicated their all to the victory in the wars.

articles.title: Child Health Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Child Health Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- An event took place at Kyongsang Kindergarten here Thursday to mark the Child Health Day.
					 Present at the event were Kim Hyong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health who is chairman of the Korean Association for Supporting the Children, members of the association, officials concerned, Nazira Artikova, acting representative of the WHO in the DPRK, and staff members of other international organizations and foreign embassies here.
					
					 A speech was followed by a public presentation of achievements and experience gained in the child health of the DPRK.
					
					 Speakers said that a well regulated child healthcare system has been established in the DPRK thanks to the love of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for the younger generation and future and renewed their resolution to exert all efforts for the nursing and upbringing of children and healthcare for them.
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance given by kindergarteners and looked round photos showing successes made in healthcare in the DPRK and cooperation activities of missions of international organizations here and drawings done by children. Then they played a sports game.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Drive for Increased Production
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Drive for Increased Production
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially calls for launching a dynamic drive for increased production across the country to significantly greet the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea with high revolutionary enthusiasm and great labor achievements. 
					 It is of urgent necessity to increase production in order to significantly improve people's diet with agricultural production, animal husbandry and fishing as the main thrusts and provide people and children with greater quantities of quality consumer goods, school things and foodstuff and give further momentum to the drive for creating the Korean speed in the construction field, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The drive for increased production means a manifestation of intense loyalty of the Korean people ready to wholeheartedly respond to the party's call and an expression of strong national self-respect and resolution to outpace the world with their own strength, technology and natural resources. 
					
					 There are for the Korean people the strong economic foundation laid by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with so much effort and the proud tradition of the drive for increased production through which they glorified the annals of the revolution with epoch-making changes. 
					
					 In the hard time of postwar rehabilitation and construction the patriotic workers of Korea turned out 120,000 ton of steel from the blooming mill with the rated capacity of 60,000 ton and produced 270,000 ton of pig iron by the iron-making equipment with the rated capacity of 190 000 ton, giving strong impetus to the building of rich and powerful country. 
					
					 There are neither difficulties insurmountable nor fortress unconquerable for us when such ardent patriotic loyalty and revolutionary enthusiasm are displayed.

articles.title: Representative of S. Korean Ruling Party Kicked out of Venue of Memorial Service
articles.content:
Representative of S. Korean Ruling Party Kicked out of Venue of Memorial Service
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The representative of the ruling "Saenuri Party" of south Korea was kicked out of the venue of a memorial all-night vigil for Kwangju popular uprisers on May 17. 
					 That day he was so shameless as to make his appearance among people from all walks of life including citizens, workers, students and bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster who met to hold the memorial service.
					
					 Infuriated by his behavior, citizens seized him by the collar and poured water on him, shouting "Go back!"
					
					 Experiencing a hot agony of shame in face of the masses, he could not but take to flight with his party members.
					
					 This was an eruption of the resentment of the south Korean public against the misrule of the "Saenuri Party" and the puppet ruling forces that have mercilessly trampled down the desire of the Kwangju uprisers.
					
					 Commenting on it, south Korean media claimed the attack on him had been expected.

articles.title: S. Korean Body to Stage June Resistance in Spirit of May 18 Popular Uprising
articles.content:
S. Korean Body to Stage June Resistance in Spirit of May 18 Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Society for Commemorating May 18 Popular Resistance of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on May 18, the 35th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 Speakers said the violence committed by the outrageous regime and the military 35 years ago is being repeated even now by the present regime and bureaucrats in a craftier and fiercer manner. 
					
					 The May 18 movement for democracy was a just resistance citizens of Kwangju and other people in South Jolla Province staged by dedicating themselves to freedom, democracy, justice and human rights against violence, dictatorship and oppression, aspiring after social democracy, they noted.
					
					 They called on the progressive forces to get united and stage a June resistance for social democracy by carrying forward the spirit of the popular uprising.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Accuses U.S. of Conspiracy to Kwangju Massacre
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Accuses U.S. of Conspiracy to Kwangju Massacre
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea held a press conference on May 18 in Seoul to denounce the U.S., backstage manipulator of the Kwangju massacre. 
					 On display at the venue of the press conference were photos showing horrible genocide committed by the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist junta under the strong backing of the U.S.
					
					 The organization made public a press release.
					
					 The press release said the U.S. was not a helper who connived at the Kwangju massacre but conspirator responsible for it, according to the analysis of U.S. secret documents declassified so far. 
					
					 At the time of the Kwangju resistance the U.S. Department of State, the U.S. embassy in Seoul, the U.S. Department of Defense and CIA were so closely watching Kwangju that they were exchanging messages minute by minute, it said, adding:
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. was directly involved in the Kwangju massacre committed by the Chun Doo Hwan military force at that time. 
					
					 The U.S. should open to public all secret documents related to the Kwangju massacre and make an apology to the bereaved families and other people for manipulating the mass killings.

articles.title: Overriding Principle of WPK's Activities Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Overriding Principle of WPK's Activities Introduced in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted an article titled "Putting the improvement of the standard of people's living above anything else" on its website on May 15 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The article said the WPK has considered the improvement of the standard of people's living as the overriding principle of the party's activities since it was founded. It went on:
					
					 Since it laid down this principle by embodying the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, the WPK has enforced the politics of warm love and trust in the people, the benevolent politics.
					
					 The party became all the more energetic in its activities of attaching great importance to the people's life under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il, the eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 The activities for the betterment of the people's living are being given steady continuity by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK is bringing about a new turn in improving the standard of the people's living under his energetic leadership who is always keen on providing a happy life to the people, the best people in the world who have remained loyal to the party despite all difficulties.
					
					 Also posted on the website were photos showing the panoramic view of Pyongyang, the Masikryong Ski Resort and the Munsu Water Park.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Guinean Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Guinean Organization
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea released a bulletin on May 14.
					 The bulletin introduced world intangible cultural heritage "Arirang".
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Korean folk song "Arirang", registered as a world intangible cultural heritage, is a typical folk song of the nation that has been sung by the Korean people in joy or in sorrow.
					
					 Grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" was registered in the Guinness Book of World Records in August 2007.
					
					 "Arirang" helps the world come to know once again about the Korean nation as a homogeneous one with one and the same language and culture.
					
					 The Korean people are strong in national identity.
					
					 Today they are demonstrating their dignity as the people with strong spirit of national independence and the Korean nation-first spirit under the wise leadership of the great leaders and the great party.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Blast Japan's Crackdown on Chongryon
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Blast Japan's Crackdown on Chongryon
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on May 14 to denounce the Japanese reactionaries' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement reminded the public of the arrest of three Chongryon officials by the Japanese policemen on May 12.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Chongryon is the dignified organization of overseas Koreans of the DPRK and it is playing the role of the diplomatic mission of the DPRK in the absence of the diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 An act of infringing upon the sovereignty of Chongryon precisely means a serious encroachment upon the DPRK. It is an act of aggression against the sovereign state.
					
					 What is lashing people into fury is that the Japanese authorities sponsored the illegal and criminal terrorist act with the approach of the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon.
					
					 A statement from the official residence of the Japanese prime minister who supported the action points to the Japanese government's back-stage manipulation.
					
					 We strongly denounce the Japanese reactionaries' repeated crackdown on Chongryon and demand the immediate release of its officials.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita a su homologo argelino
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita a su homologo argelino
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion a Abdel Malik Sellal, renombrado como premier de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular.
					Convencido de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente le desea al destinatario mayores exitos en su labor para lograr la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.
					
					El mismo dia, el canciller coreano Ri Su Yong envio a su vez un mensaje de felicitacion a Ramtane Lamamra, renombrado como canciller del mismo pais africano.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Eslovaquia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Eslovaquia
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- Milan Lajciak presento el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Eslovaquia en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico

articles.title: ACRC acusa a Sur de Corea de abusador de asuntos humanitarios
articles.content:
ACRC acusa a Sur de Corea de abusador de asuntos humanitarios
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- En su llamada palabra de felicitacion pronunciada el dia 19, Park Geun-hye se refirio al "sufrimiento de los familiares separados de la edad avanzada" y a los "esfuerzos en el nivel de gobierno" y exigio absurdamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la "reapertura del encuentro de los familiares separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea".
					Con anterioridad, Park en una reunion con la delegacion compuesta por "habitantes de provincias del Norte de Corea" dijo que "el Norte niega siquiera la propuesta del dialogo" dando vista gorda al dolor de los "familiares separados". De esta manera, desvia la opinion publica imputando a la RPDC la responsabilidad del fracaso del encuentro de los familiares separados.
					
					La banda titere surcoreana lanza a las entidades de las escorias humanas como el "comite de diez millones de familiares separados" y los medios de prensa conservadores  a dar publicidad como si la RPDC asumiera la responsabilidad  de la no apertura del encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados.
					
					Y parlotea como si hiciera algo para la mejora practica del problema de encuentro e impide todos los contactos y los viajes entre ambas partes coreanas, mientras crea perversamente el clima de confrontacion insistiendo en las "medidas responsables" de alguien. 
					
					En una declaracion fechada 20, el portavoz de Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea califico los dichos y hechos de la banda surcoreana de sofisteria descarada de quienes fracasaron el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados y de provocacion politica imperdonable contra la RPDC.
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos desarrollan cotidianamente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de agresion a la RPDC, rechazados fuertemente por el interior y exterior del pais, por una parte y por la otra, hablan de la "tristeza y penalidad de los familiares separados", lo que es el climax de la hipocresia y el engano de la opinion publica, senalo el portavoz y continuo:
					
					La verdadera intencion de la banda de Park es para eludir  las responsabilidades de haber llevado las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica hablando del "humanitarismo" y salir de la crisis del "poder" desviando la opinion publica del interior y exterior del pais.
					
					Lanzar sofisterias tales como "moralidad" y la "penalidad" al criminalizar el encuentro de los compatriotas es un acto malvado antietico destinado a dar sablazo dos veces a la  triste alma de los familiares y parientes separados.
					
					La banda titere del Sur de Corea no puede liberarse con cualquiera charlataneria de las responsabilidades de haber fracasado el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a acoger festival de octubre con el aumento de produccion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a acoger festival de octubre con el aumento de produccion
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- En el editorial divulgado este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun llama a avivar el fervor de aumento de produccion en todo el pais para acoger con elevado entusiasmo revolucionario y relevantes exitos laborales el 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Hay que aumentar decisivamente la produccion para mejorar el nivel de vida alimentaria del pueblo tomando como tres pilares la agricultura, la ganaderia y la pesqueria, suministrar mucho mas articulos de consumo, ajuares de estudio y alimentos de buena calidad a los habitantes y ninos escolares e incrementar de continuo el fervor de creacion de la velocidad de Corea en la rama de construccion, senala el editorial y continua:
					
					La campana de aumento de produccion es la expresion de la noble fidelidad del pueblo coreano hacia el partido y de la conciencia nacional de superar el nivel mundial por propias fuerzas, tecnicas y recursos. 
					
					Tenemos fuerte base economica preparada por los grandes lideres y la orgullosa tradicion de haber registrado con el aumento de produccion los cambios seculares en los anales de la revolucion. 
					
					En el tiempo posbelico tan dificil, los coreanos promovieron la construccion de la patria prospera produciendo 120 mil toneladas de materiales de acero en el laminador blooming con capacidad de 60 mil, y 270 mil toneladas de hierro colado con el equipo de capacidad de 190 mil toneladas.
					
					Con tal patriotismo y pasion revolucionario no tenemos ninguna meta inconquistable.
